# dapkings

The goal of dapkings is to provide access to OpenDAP servers. 

## Installation

You can install dapkings from GitHub with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mdsumner/dapkings")
```
